title: Program budgeting
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, Gil Davidson and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
brief_description: Dr. Brian Caldwell, senior lecturer in Educational Administration University of Tasmania, explains what program budgeting is and how it can benefit schools and school programs.
